rockAtlas.bookkeeping.bookkeeper (class) ∞

class rockAtlas.bookkeeping.bookkeeper(log, settings=False, fullUpdate=False)[source] ∞

The worker class for the bookkeeper module

Key Arguments:
  • log – logger
  • settings – the settings dictionary
  • fullUpdate – a full update (not just recently changed exposures and sources)

Usage:

To setup your logger, settings and database connections, please use the fundamentals package (see tutorial here).

To initiate a bookkeeper object, use the following:

from rockAtlas.bookkeeping import bookkeeper
bk = bookkeeper(
    log=log,
    settings=settings,
    fullUpdate=False
)
__init__(log, settings=False, fullUpdate=False)[source] ∞
